events.title: animation workshop - garticphone
events.desc: For this week's animation event we will be playing Gartic Phone, an online collaborative drawing game! We encourage you to bring a drawing tablet or iPad if you have one, but your phone will work well too!

events.title: halloween cosplay party

events.desc: Join the cosplay competition to show off your outfit with the chance to win prizes, sing your favourite songs at karaoke, make friends with other weebs, and have fun!
